name: NekoSumo
description:
Have you ever wanted to make your friends pay for what they have done to you?

Is Honda your favourite street fighter Character?
Have you ever dreamed about becoming a big and fatty kitty?

Well, I have good news for you, you just found your perfect game!

Control one of our fighters and win the "Balance over the river fight". You can jump, run, hit, push and throw hairballs to your oponent. 
But be careful , cranes and carps does not like anyone doing weird things in their river.
